name: WME Maximized
description: Modifies the Waze Map Editor layout and chat to provide a larger viewing area for editing.
additional_info:
Modifications to increase visible map area:
  • Chat:
    • User list removed
    • Moved to right of page
    • Decreased width
    • Height adjusts according to message list
  • Header:
    • Height, logo, and font sizes decreased.
  • Sidebar:
    • Welcome removed
    • Width decreased
  • Toolbox Toolbar:
    • Moved to sidebar area
    • Dragable within sidebar
    • Colors adjusted for visibility
